modName: The Fountain of Youth - POTC in Skyrim
summary: A mod that adds in the fountain of youth to skyrim
descriptionHtml:
This is a recreation of the fountain of youth from the 4th Pirates of the Caribbean in skyrim. It uses parts from Dawnguard (such as the rubble and the fountain) and it has new grass textures included. I thought of making it when replaying the Dawnguard DLC as Ancestor Glade resembled it.

Access to it is through a cave just outside Falkreath.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Rq7FO46.jpg[/img]
author: Harrrrry
